name: Luna
description: Playful and affectionate, loves belly rubs and fetch.

name: Whiskers
description: Quiet and calm, enjoys lounging in sunny spots.

name: Buddy
description: Energetic and great with kids. Always ready to play.

name: Mochi
description: Curious and chatty. Loves attention and playtime.

name: Max
description: Loyal and protective, makes a great companion.

name: Ziggy
description: Gentle giant who loves naps and brushing sessions.

name: Benny
description: Loyal and friendly, enjoys sniffing out adventures.

name: Nala
description: Loves to climb and perch. Very playful and social.

name: Rocky
description: Fun-loving and silly. Enjoys running and tug-of-war.

name: Chloe
description: Laid-back and regal. Loves cozy blankets.
